targets.expr: sum by(http_user_agent) (count_over_time({job="varlogs", regions=~"$regions", status=~"$status", chain_name=~"$chain_name"} | json http_user_agent [$__range]))
topk(10, sum by(request, status) (count_over_time({job="varlogs", regions=~"$regions", status=~"$status", chain_name=~"$chain_name"} | json request [$__range])))
sum by(chain_name, regions) (count_over_time({job="varlogs", regions=~"$regions", status=~"$status", chain_name=~"$chain_name"} | status = `401` [$interval]))

panels.title: Error Codes by Blockchain and Region

targets.expr: sum by(chain_name, regions) (count_over_time({job="varlogs", regions=~"$regions", status=~"$status", chain_name=~"$chain_name"} | status = `401` [$__range]))

panels.title: Error Codes by Blockchain and Region

targets.expr: avg by(chain_name, regions) (avg_over_time({job="varlogs", regions=~"$regions", status=~"2\\d{2}", chain_name=~"$chain_name"} | json request_time | unwrap request_time | __error__=`` [$interval]) * 1000)

panels.title: Average Request Time by Blockchain and Region

targets.expr: quantile_over_time(0.50, {job="varlogs", regions=~"$regions", status=~"2\\d{2}", chain_name=~"$chain_name"} | json request_time | unwrap request_time | __error__=`` [$interval]) by (chain_name, regions) * 1000

panels.title: Request Time P50 by Blockchain and Region

targets.expr: quantile_over_time(0.90, {job="varlogs", regions=~"$regions", status=~"2\\d{2}", chain_name=~"$chain_name"} | json request_time | unwrap request_time | __error__=`` [$interval]) by (chain_name, regions) * 1000

panels.title: Request Time P90 by Blockchain and Region

targets.expr: avg by(chain_name, regions) (avg_over_time({job="varlogs", regions=~"$regions", status=~"2\\d{2}", chain_name=~"$chain_name"} | json upstream_response_time | unwrap upstream_response_time | __error__=`` [$interval]) * 1000)

panels.title: Average Upstream Latency by Blockchain and Region

targets.expr: quantile_over_time(0.5, {job="varlogs", regions=~"$regions", status=~"2\\d{2}", chain_name=~"$chain_name"} | json upstream_response_time | unwrap upstream_response_time | __error__=`` [$interval]) by (chain_name, regions)

panels.title: Upstream Latency P50 by Blockchain and Region

targets.expr: quantile_over_time(0.9, {job="varlogs", regions=~"$regions", status=~"2\\d{2}", chain_name=~"$chain_name"} | json upstream_response_time | unwrap upstream_response_time | __error__=`` [$interval]) by (chain_name, regions)

panels.title: Upstream Latency P90 by Blockchain and Region

targets.expr: sum by(regions) (rate(pocketcore_geo_mesh_relay_time_sum{chain_name=~"$chain_name", regions=~"$regions", is_notify="false"}[$__rate_interval])) / sum by(regions) (rate(pocketcore_geo_mesh_relay_time_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", regions=~"$regions", is_notify="false"}[$__rate_interval]))

sum by(regions, chain_name) (rate(pocketcore_geo_mesh_relay_time_sum{chain_name=~"$chain_name", regions=~"$regions", is_notify="false"}[$__rate_interval])) / sum by(regions, chain_name) (rate(pocketcore_geo_mesh_relay_time_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", regions=~"$regions", is_notify="false"}[$__rate_interval]))
